units.name: Linear metre
units.description: Unit of length used for linear measurements

units.name: Square metre
units.description: Unit of area used for flooring, walls, roofing, and surface coverage

units.name: Cubic metre
units.description: Unit of volume used for concrete, excavation, and material quantities

units.name: Millimetre
units.description: Sub-unit of length for precise measurements

units.name: Centimetre
units.description: Sub-unit of length

units.name: Kilometre
units.description: Unit of length for longer distances

units.name: Hectare
units.description: Unit of area for land measurement (10,000 m²)

units.name: Number
units.description: Unit count for discrete items or components

units.name: Item
units.description: Single item or unit count

units.name: Each
units.description: Per each item

units.name: Pair
units.description: Two items together

units.name: Set
units.description: Collection of items

units.name: Tonne
units.description: Metric ton (1000 kg) for material quantities

units.name: Kilogram
units.description: Unit of mass or weight

units.name: Gram
units.description: Sub-unit of weight

units.name: Litre
units.description: Unit of liquid or fluid volume

units.name: Millilitre
units.description: Sub-unit of liquid volume

units.name: Hour
units.description: Unit of time for labour and equipment rental

units.name: Day
units.description: Unit of time (8 hours or 24 hours depending on context)

units.name: Week
units.description: Unit of time (7 days)

units.name: Month
units.description: Unit of time (approximately 30 days)

units.name: Year
units.description: Unit of time (12 months)

units.name: Lump sum
units.description: Fixed price for complete work item or component

units.name: Provisional sum
units.description: Allowance for work where final quantity is uncertain

units.name: Contingency
units.description: Allowance for unforeseen costs or variations

units.name: Prime cost
units.description: Allowance for materials to be selected later

units.name: Square foot
units.description: Imperial unit of area (sometimes used in Australia for legacy estimates)

units.name: Linear foot
units.description: Imperial unit of length (sometimes used in Australia for legacy estimates)

units.name: Cubic foot
units.description: Imperial unit of volume

units.name: Tonne (alternate)
units.description: Metric ton expressed as full word

units.name: Running metre
units.description: Linear metre, typically for materials sold by the metre

units.name: Linear
units.description: Linear measurement unit

units.name: Square metre (alternate)
units.description: Square metre expressed as combined notation

units.name: Cubic metre (alternate)
units.description: Cubic metre expressed as combined notation

units.name: Labour hour
units.description: Hour of labour work

units.name: Equipment hour
units.description: Hour of equipment hire or operation

units.name: Allowance
units.description: General allowance for undefined work

units.name: Fixed rate
units.description: Fixed rate regardless of quantity
